Food Pantry.title: Raider Red's Food Pantry | Raider Relief - Advocacy and Resource Center | TTU
Food Pantry.text:
Raider Relief - Advocacy and Resource Center  FP Fall 25 hours    What is the purpose of Raider Red's Food Pantry? Raider Red's Food Pantry provides supplemental non-perishable food and hygiene items
                              to students who may face hardships, and  is designed to complement other resources
                              available. Students experiencing long-term hardships are encouraged to contact the Raider Relief
                              - Advocacy & Resource Center (RRARC) for additional assistance.    Raider Red's Food Pantry Guidelines: Users will be required to complete a brief intake form during the registration process.
                              No proof of income is required to access Raider Red's Food Pantry. @raiderrelief      Please note that Raider Red's Food Pantry will follow any weather-related delays/instructions
                              as released by Texas Tech University. Students not able to visit the food pantry at these times, please email foodpantry@ttu.edu.  Contact Us! Phone number: (806) 742-1932Email: foodpantry@ttu.edu For TTUHSC Students:    What if I need additional assistance aside from food? Visit our Raider Relief- Advocacy and Resource Center page for additional on-campus resources and off-campus referrals. These resources
                              include academic success strategies, child care, employment, financial counseling,
                              housing options, and more.
